column2: For  ease  of reference,  I  produce  below  sub  rule  (1),  (2)  and  (3)  of Rule

column1: 5(2)  of Part  IV,  of the  Court  of Appeal  (Appellate  Procedure)  Rules  1990,

column2: This  rule  shall  apply  to  applications  under  Articles  140  and  141  of the
Constitution,  in  which  a  public  officer  has  been  made  a  Respondent  in
his  official  capacity,  (whether  on  account  of an  act  or omission  in  such
official  capacity,  or  to  obtain  relief  against  him  in  such  capacity,  or
